overview: Touched is a romantic comedy about a man named Peter Wates whose life changes drastically the day he turns 18, and realizes he can get any woman he wants. He wasn’t a smooth-talking, charming man. He didn’t have the striking physique of a Greek statue, or the face of a heavenly being. He was normal; but a curse brought on by his father’s infidelity granted him an ability that any man would die for. At first, Peter believes his ‘touch’ is more of a gift than a curse – until he meets the love of his life and finds the ‘blessing’ brings more chaos than he ever imagined.
title: Touched
